object.name: blackberry.widgetcache.CacheInformation
object.comment: The CacheInformation object provides information about entities saved in the widget cache.

property.name: url
property.comment: Contains the URL string of the mapping request.

property.name: size
property.comment: Contains the disk size of the cached copy.

property.name: expires
property.comment: Contains the expiration date of the cached copy.
